ca1a1af8-1d1b-4eef-892b-8d92b0a89d41.Text: For the next attack against a target affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g}, that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} and block will be reduced by −<u>(15 + ({unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} / 2) × stacks of exploit)</u>%. This attack will have +<u>(15 + ({unit_stat|WarhammerPerception|bonus} / 2) × stacks of exploit)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g}. It will also do +(75 + {unit_stat|WarhammerPerception})% damage.

c9d22b73-9f30-40ec-8550-00bdbfa2f8c6.Text: {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Alpha Strike{/g} grants the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} equal to <u>(number of {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} removed)</u> (minimum 1) until the end of combat. Stacks.

de578abd-c1e5-42da-b022-e431e335a598.Text: If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|f:7b00b5ea0dc246e1a304619d5678ca5b}Alpha Strike{/g} on a target affected by {uip|MinimumStacks|5be08b3ea6fa4b82a3473de749e68488} or more {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} and scores a {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g}, that hit becomes a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

d9fe0ee9-f347-417a-9bdc-380fb74c9318.Text:
Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} triggers an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on an enemy, the Operative gains +2 damage and +2% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} until the end of combat. Only applies to the first strike or projectile in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack. Stacks.
Critical hits will not count towards the attack limit, allowing up to two exra attacks per round. If using a multi-hitting attack, this will only trigger if the first hit is a critical.

a6b9621a-5d74-43d9-9b6e-5d3402b6550b.Text:
The Operative removes all {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g} from the target, decreasing the target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} by −<u>(20 + exploits removed × {uip|multipliyer|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a})</u>% until the start of the Operative's next turn.
If this ability reduces the target's armour to 0, the Operative removes only half of the exploits from the target.
The target will also suffer from an increased critical chance from attackers by {uip|criticalbonus|fbdba5fe2a264c25bada29aecd64049a}.

3269e346-5c49-4e64-b9a9-7b6033a7d11a.Text:
While the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} bonus is 10 or higher, they gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}.
Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill are increased by {uip|StatBonus|1d6a3bacdb914699b83d564a1f22bfbc}.

651f40ee-ed3f-4d2a-9c5b-6442666e385b.Text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} targets one enemy within {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. That target immediately gains +{uip|Exploits|502b9195c84c42c5b180f3f63ed7955c} {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g}.

43ab4851-d540-43eb-b72d-49d1df84a3f8.Text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} inflicts an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} even on enemies which are out of the Operative's {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g} at the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative's{/g} Perception is higher than their Agility, dodge chance is calculated using Perception instead.

e2921f84-b672-427f-95e9-d0acf6d9bbf2.Text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} suffers −{uip|DamageReduction|4c56ec5c399f4c70815dd5596b0e7b83}% less {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from enemies affected by {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploits{/g}.

1973b25f-e5c3-4428-a497-510eea0ccb7f.Text:
The Operative gains +25% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover{/g} efficiency (if in cover), +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, and a 75% recoil reduction.
This effect lasts until the Operative moves. Does not stack.
